content: this blanket is worked flat from end to end circular needles are used to accommodate the large number of stitches for bobbles you may find it easier to knit backward on wrong side row rather than turning your work finished measurements width 49 length 30 materials premier® yarns anti-pilling® everyday® bamboo chunky 80% anti-pilling acrylic 20% rayon from bamboo 3 5oz/100g 131yds/120m 1085-18 kiwi 9 balls needles us size 10 6 mm and us size 11 8 mm 32 circulars or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle 2 cable needles gauge 12 sts x 14 row = 4 in st st with larger needle 35-st cable panel repeat measures 9½ wide with larger needle *save time check your gauge * skills/techniques used in this pattern knit and purl stitches slipping stitches cables knitting through the back loop bobbles
